segments.text: I see the water from the sink is making a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just going to keep getting bigger if no one turns off the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying that plate, not paying attention to anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going to hurt himself if he falls from that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't watch, it's making me nervous just thinking about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to care about the danger either.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside looks so peaceful, it's hard to believe the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just turn off the water and stop the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
